Fantasy Isle Paddy:
Welcome to the Fantasy Isle! My name is Paddy. I work here as a Gatekeeper. Talk to me if you want to leave the isle. However, I strongly suggest you rest a bit longer!
While staying with us, you can find some Fantasy Isle Coins. I can exchange them for valuable items! Also, my hobby is collecting shirts, so if you have a shirt enchanted to +8, I'd be happy to exchange it for a +10 shirt! Tempting, isn't it?
